exceptions.summary: Thrown when the registry client is null.

memberSignatures.value: public AsyncSchemaRegistryDeserializer (Confluent.SchemaRegistry.ISchemaRegistryClient registryClient, Chr.Avro.Serialization.IBinaryDeserializerBuilder deserializerBuilder = null, Chr.Avro.Representation.IJsonSchemaReader schemaReader = null);

parameters.name: registryClient
parameters.summary: The client to use for Schema Registry operations. (The client will not be disposed.)

parameters.name: deserializerBuilder
parameters.summary:
The deserializer builder used to generate deserialization functions for C# types. If
            none is provided, the default deserializer builder will be used.

parameters.name: schemaReader
parameters.summary:
The JSON schema reader used to convert schemas received from the registry into abstract
            representations. If none is provided, the default schema reader will be used.

exceptions.summary: Thrown when the registry configuration is null.
